Member Function Documentation

◆ cast() [1/2]

bool rev::WorldRay::cast ( const AABB &  aabb,
double &  tmin,
double &  tmax 
) const

Test if the ray hits the specified bounding box.

When tmin < 0, the ray origin is inside the box

Parameters
[out]tmaxThe distance to the intersection point, such that when the ray is inside the AABB, tmax*ray.m_direction + ray.m_origin is the intersection point
[out]tminThe distance to the intersection point, such that when the ray is outside the AABB, tmin*ray.m_direction + ray.m_origin is the intersection point

◆ TriangleIntersect()

bool rev::WorldRay::TriangleIntersect ( const Vector3 &  orig,
const Vector3 &  dir,
const Vector3 &  v0,
const Vector3 &  v1,
const Vector3 &  v2,
float &  t,
float &  u,
float &  v,
Vector3 &  out_v0v1,
Vector3 &  out_v0v2 
)
static

Determine an intersection with a triangle.

Note
See: https://gamedev.stackexchange.com/questions/114955/m%C3%B6ller-trumbore-intersection-point
Parameters
[in]origThe origin of the raycast
[in]dirThe direction of the raycast
[in]tthe distance from P (the intersection point) to the ray origin
[in]uthe barycentric coordinate value such that P = v0 + u*v0v2 + v*v0v1
[in]vthe barycentric coordinate value such that P = v0 + u*v0v2 + v*v0v1
[out]v0v1
[out]v0v2
